doss

Interface Blob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named, Sized
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalBlob

    public interface Blob
extends Named, Sized
    A named byte stream of known length that supports random read access.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SeekableByteChannel openChannel()
      Opens the blob for reading a returns a seekable byte channel.
      InputStream openStream()
      Opens the blob for reading and returns an InputStream.
      String slurp()
      Reads the contents of the blob into a string (decodes with UTF-8).

      • Methods inherited from interface doss.Named

        id

      • Methods inherited from interface doss.Sized

        size

    • Method Detail

      • openStream

        InputStream openStream()
                       throws IOException
        Opens the blob for reading and returns an InputStream.
        Returns:
        an InputStream for reading from the blob
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • openChannel

        SeekableByteChannel openChannel()
                                throws IOException
        Opens the blob for reading a returns a seekable byte channel.
        Returns:
        a channel for reading from the blob
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O occurs

      • slurp

        String slurp()
             throws IOException
        Reads the contents of the blob into a string (decodes with UTF-8).
        Returns:
        the contents of the blob
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
